RelicHunt.questDescriptionRules.rulesStr.li: questDescription(classicMode==True)->You've learned that a valuable relic is nearby.\n\nThe [relic_name] is one of [relicGlobalCount] ancient objects venerated by many people. If you could collect it, you could build a reliquary to make your colonists happy and attract wealthy pilgrims.

questDescription(classicMode==False)->You've learned that a relic of [ideo_name] is nearby.\n\nThe [relic_name] is an ancient object venerated by all [ideo_memberNamePlural]. If you could collect it, you could build a great reliquary to make [ideo_memberNamePlural] happy, attract wealthy pilgrims, and bring more people to [ideo_name].
questDescriptionPartBeforeDiscovery->우선 [relic_name](을)를 찾아야 합니다. 관련 정보를 수집할 기회를 주시하세요.
